scripts.start: concurrently -n "FE,BE" -c "white,blue" -p "[{name}]"  "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FE,BE" -c "white,blue" -p "[{name}]"  "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n "FE,BE" -c "white,blue" -p "[{name}]"  "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
